job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description:
RESOLVIT
Bringing Solutions That Make Business Better
Join Resolvit as a
Machine Learning Operations Engineer
and be part of a creative, forward-thinking team. Our success at deploying skilled, highly knowledgeable experts has landed us on the Inc. 5000 list of America’s fastest-growing companies four times – and we’re just getting started.
As the
Machine Learning Operations Engineer
, you will implement, monitor, and maintain a suite of machine learning tools. You will bring your deep expertise in MLOps to analyze and recommend enterprise-wide solutions for operationalizing AI/ML analytics. You will also develop end-to-end Data, Dev, and MLOps pipelines based on in-depth understanding of AI lifecycle and business problems to ensure solutions are delivered efficiently, predictably, and sustainably.
What You’ll Need to be Successful:
At least 8 years of technical experience in a technology business
At least 3 years of experience as a machine learning engineer
Bachelor’s degree in engineering, physics, chemistry, mathematics, or computer science or relevant and significant industry experience
Experience with AI/ML, video analytic edge computing, Kubernetes, and Docker solutions
Proficiency in C/C++, Python, GO, or similar languages
Proficiency with Computer Vision tools such as Open CV and Deep Learning Frameworks (Keras, TensorFlow, PyTorch)
Experience deploying scalable AI solutions that solve industry problems
Experience with structured and unstructured data
Data engineering background
Experience with data science models at scale
Experience with MLOps tools (MLFlow)
Benefits:
At Resolvit, you’ll be given the support you need to grow in your consulting career. In addition to opportunities for advancement, we offer:
Medical, dental, and vision insurance
Life insurance coverage
Long-term and short-term disability coverage
401(k) retirement plan with matching
Professional support from our Client & Employee Optimization Specialist
About Resolvit:
Resolvit is an international technology consulting firm with industry-leading customers in the financial services, high tech, manufacturing, retail, life sciences, and government sectors. Through its partnerships, Resolvit delivers highly impactful, innovative solutions across five core areas: Infrastructure Modernization, Application Development Services, Enterprise Data Management & Analytics, Knowledge & Content Management, and Strategic Staffing.
